text: Aur yeh quran aisa nahi hai kay Allah (ki wahee) kay baghair (apney hi say) gharr liya gaya ho. Bulkay yeh to (unn kitabon ki) tasdeeq kerney wala hai jo iss kay qabal (nazil) ho chuki hain aur kitab (ehkaam-e-zarooriya) ki tafseel biyan kerney wala hai iss mein koi baat shak ki nahi kay rab-ul-aalameen ki taraf say hai
